entry.source: 〉 The people of the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado are no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The people of the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado are no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dignified Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403042}To march off to unknown lands without{F801}any knowing where we might sleep next...{F801}{F802}It pains me to think of how anxious the{F801}people whose lives we are uprooting{F801}must be.{F801}{F802}But K, Abbot Hugo, and our Commander{F801}will be with us. And more than that...{F801}{F802}You are with us, {F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dignified Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403042}To march off to unknown lands without{F801}any knowing where we might sleep next...{F801}{F802}It pains me to think of how anxious the{F801}people whose lives we are uprooting{F801}must be.{F801}{F802}But K, Abbot Hugo, and our Commander{F801}will be with us. And more than that...{F801}{F802}You are with us, {F843,0}.{F801}
